item.description:
Mu Lan 835 Main St Waltham, MA 02451 tel (781) 642-8888 http://www.mulan-ma.com

Categories: Restaurants Chinese Restaurants Taiwanese Chinese, Menu  http://www.mulan-ma.com/html/dinner%20menu.html

For those who enjoy the flavors of Asian food, but not the spice, Taiwanese tends to be less spicy that Sichuan cooking in the west of China. It is also considered very healthy, as it uses less oil and salt than Chinese cuisine. We strong recommend The smoked pork with leek for people trying for the first time.

That is our specialty. It is very difficult to make. Our chief is the only one who can make it in all of Massachusetts. The salted crispy chicken is also very popular, and so are our handmade dumplings. Make yourself at home at Mulan. Let us take care of all the details for you. From food to music to flowers, we've got you covered. Please call us with your questions.

 

From Yelp:  This place is for legit authentic Chinese dishes only..

Things that passed the taste test:

Beef with leek wrapped in pancakes

Spiced beef

Fried pork intestines

Fish fillet in spicy bean sauce

House special fish

Shredded pork with spicy garlic sauce

Beef tendon in chili sauce

Lamb with hot chili (or any lamb dish tbh. C'mon, who doesn't like lamb?)

Diced chicken with spicy sauce

Ma-bo bean curd

Eggplant with spicy garlic sauce

Stir fried string bean

Sauteed Chinese squash

 

Don't bother making any after-dinner plans. You will have a serious food coma. In fact, it might not even be safe to drive home.  The portion sizes are huge, everything is family style. We had the egg rolls, hot and sour soup, beef with spicy peppers, tofu in spicy sauce, and house special fish.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for and ask for Bigaio inside, its a small place so it will be easy to find us a group of 20!
item.name: Authentic Chinese/Taiwanese Dinner in Waltham - Last Minute
